name: Slipsilk™ Skinny Scrunchies - 4 pack
about: What it is:  Award-winning scrunchies to match your hair tone. Designed to avoid hair creases. Anti crease, anti breakage. Upgrade your hair tie game...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..What Else You Need to Know:  Upgrade your hair tie game. From the makers of the Slip anti-aging, anti-sleep crease, anti-bed head pure silk pillowcase, these scrunchies were designed to avoid hair creases. They are made with specially selected elastic and a slipsilk™ covering to be gentle on your delicate hair...Slipsilk is specially-commissioned and made to Slip’s exacting standards, developed and refined over 10 years to provide the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness, and durability. They use the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, and enforce the strictest quality guidelines, including non-toxic dyes...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This Set Contains:.- 4 x slip™ pure silk skinny scrunchies..

reviews.review_text: S’étire vraiment facilement et rapidement vraiment déçu du produit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this because I have heard a lot of good things about Slip scrunchies but for the price I was not impressed. They stretched out really easy and are now unusable. I read a few things online about shrinking them that I may try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are a bit pricy but totally worth it for your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these.  I DID love these.  But not for long.  They stretched out so much so quickly.  For the price point I had much higher expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since purchase I have rotated using the three colors. I usually wear the scrunchie on my wrist since normal hair ties are usually way too tight. No hair pull when you undo your hair either! Hair doesn’t seem to get caught in them easily either; you can just pull the excess right out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely insane how expensive these are. They are hair ties. Be for real.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone
reviews.review_text: These are my absolute favorite hair ties. I would highly highly recommend them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was wanting to upgrade my hair tie situation. I gave these a try and never looking back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scrunchies. My hair has reduced its breaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these hair ties! It doesn’t rip my hair out like some others I get from the drugstore, and I like how they come in a pack because Im horrible at keep tracking of my hair ties lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the slip skinny scrunchies!! This are great for breakage and casual wear, I wear them a lot when tying up my hair for bedtime. However they stretch out really quickly and are not great for exercise with a lot of movement but otherwise they’re great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looove this scrunchies it looks so cute on my wrist and hair, it never pulls my hair out when im taking it off my hair, it feels so light and soft too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m so glad i tried these! they’re expensive and not necessary, but if regular hair ties bother you these might be worth a go. i usually use big scrunchies but i’m not always wanting that much of a Lewk ™. these are as comfortable while still being discreet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these pull my hair out! two stars for redhead inclusion. you can do better with another silk scrunchie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never breaks hair, but stretches out if you use it to put up long hair in a messy bun for too long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So gentle on my hair and holds very well! Soft and comes in cute colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a must if you’re looking for a silk scrunchie that won’t leave any lines in your hair while sleeping. I typically go 3-4 days without washing my hair and using this scrunchie helps me not to wake up with lines in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the worst scrunchie I’ve ever had. Everytime it came to taking it out, it tangled and pulled my hair some much - one time even having to cut it out of my hair it got so knotted in my hair. I rarely encounter hair ties that get to caught it my hair I have to cut it out - unless it’s a pure rubber band elastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite i will keep buying and buying them!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail. I’m so glad they came out with a hair-matching color. I won’t wear any other hair tie unless I’m doing an intense workout, and even in that case I use a slightly cheaper version of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used slip skinny scrunchies for a very long time now and I was SO excited when I saw these hair color versions come out. I love these so much and they have kept my hair healthy. They do stretch out after a while but most hair ties do

reviews.review_title: Loves these! Will definitely buy more!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow my expectations for these hair times were pretty low I don’t know why, but seriously don’t think I can never go back to any other hair time! And they’re so beautiful too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these new colours including the copper to match cuz I’m a redhead

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear these every day! Used to get a lot of breakage from non-snag elastic but don’t get any of these. More colors plz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving how it feels on my hair. Pretty and holds very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like how they do not pull or rip out my hair… however after only 3 months they have stretched out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best scrunchies I’ve ever had. Very gentle with my hair. It is kinda expensive but it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a must have if you’re on your hair recovery journey!! it’s kind of tough for fine hair as it slips out sometimes but it’s definitely manageable to use! I hang on to these like they’re gold because of the price point but they’re definitely worth it when wanting to take good care of your hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They are 10$ per scrunchie and in a short time I have already lost 2. They slide out of my hair too easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for messy bun quick pony tail. Also doesn’t bother my wrist when I war it there. And it looks nice silky and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It looses its elasticity after just few uses and it keeps on falling and getting loose and while sleeping it just slips out and fall so whole purpose is defeated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super cute scrunchies! these are my absolute favorite. I love all the different designs/colors, makes it easy to match w outfits. they’re very stretchy & don’t crease my hair at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these hair elastics. I have quite a few of them as I find they are the only ones that don’t tug on my hair and doesn’t leave kinks. Win all around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These have actually helped me mend my hair after bleaching and I feel comfortable sleeping in them at night! Such a fun lil luxury item to own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how easy these feel on my hair and doesn’t rip my hair out when I take the scrunchie off! Also stylish on my wrist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I have thin medium length hair and I wear clip ins hair extensions, and these scrunchies are the only thing I like to wear to put my hair up, doesn’t give me a headache and it’s not rough on the hair. It holds hair better than anything I have tried so far and the silk makes it easy to take off, just slides right off when taking them out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These stretched out very quickly. There is a way to get them small again (I think you put them in the dryer? Not too sure), but for the price I would like to be able to use my hair ties for more than a couple weeks without having to revive them. Also, if you put your hair in a tighter pony or bun, you WILL still get a mark on your hair. Did they pull on my hair less? Yeah, a little. But I wouldn’t buy them again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely thick hair and these scrunchies can wrap around me hair 3 times, which is a literal miracle. I love the material because it doesn’t break my hair. They look so cute on your wrist too. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these and how they don’t snag my hair. I haven’t had any issues with them stretching out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Game changer! No damage and so soft. Too bad I got my 3 girls hooked to this scrunchie and now everyone needs a set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love them ! Does not leave a crease on your hair and you can wear it on your wrist without it hurting you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I had read the reviews but bought on a whim in store. Stretch out after a few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like them. Don’t hold well the hair. Got ripped out quick, did not last for long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They did exactly what all of the other reviews said that they would, and stretched out too much immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these scrunchies are honestly really nice in your hair but for over $6 a piece, it’s a little insane how much they stretch out. i also don’t have super thick hair so i don’t know why they get so stretched out. it’s frustrating because i really like them but in the end not worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are trash quality. These scrunchies are only good for a few uses before they’re way too lose. My issue was that to not ruin it I had to only wrap it around my hair twice, but that kept slipping out. If i did it a third time to keep my hair in place, it would stretch out soooooo quickly!! I know these are appearing because their silk and small scrunchies, but you can find better ones elsewhere

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are cute, but they stretched out really quickly. I have to put multiple loops now, and I feel them pulling my hair- so it defeats the purpose of them being silk. I do not wear them every day, so I am disappointed they did not last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these hair ties! They hold my hair well and don’t slip, and they are super cute and don’t damage my hair. Win win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite products comes from Slip. This scrunchies are game changers in term of your hair breakage due pony tales. Plus colors are nice and sophisticated. Also, will be great as a gift for literally anyone. Ow yes and they look cute on your wrist))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off...I always used to lose my hair ties but with these never again because they are far from being cheap! That being said they are great! My hair tangles way less and they are cute when it comes to styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Simply obsessed. I LOVE these. Absolutely love. So much healthier for your hair and look so chic! As for the bad reviews saying they stretch- I use them daily and had a set for 9 months and only had ONE stretch out. As long as you take care of them they will last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these. I feel like my hair stays really well and they’re super cute. A lot easier on your hair too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this beauty, very nice to use, highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not long-lasting and it will stretch out too soon. Won't repurchase from Slip.

reviews.review_title: my favorite but might not be yours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Slip scrunchie. It's soft, cute and holds just enough to not feel like your head hurt after a while. I have short but thick hair and it stays in place. I could see it holding less if you have thin hair. If you take care of it even with daily use it will last over a year like mine. If you treat it like a savage and pull/stretch it indecently this is not for you, will last around a month max.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are the best hair ties! They hold up my thick hair without damaging nor leaving a crease and when not using them, I can leave on my wrist as an added accessory!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these.  Best Scrunchies I have ever used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bleach blonde and pink hair, I’ve been dying my hair for years and honestly it’s pretty fragile and damaged. When I was considering purchasing these silk slip hair ties - I thought well I might be returning these. It’s very expensive for a couple hair ties but for the last month, I have only used these and am a believer. I don’t pull out hair with these and I’ve also purchased the silk slip pillow case in pink. Beautiful color and losing less hair, just one of the many steps I’m taking to stop the damage! They need more color options and I plan on getting the bigger scrunching size as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: They do crease your hair I tried it several times after washing my hair after blow dried hair going to bed always left me a crease and I don’t make it super tight didn’t work for me sadly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE these and they are the only hair ties I use now . HOWEVER the elastic inside of the silk outside is poor quality . They stretch out and don't retain their shape well . I use them besides this but a couple of them have stretched out so much I can no longer use them . For the price they should be better quality elastic . I also noticed if you have any sort of oil product in your hair it ruins them as well .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with these scrunchies I wish I would’ve purchased them sooner. I have really long hair and regular hair ties always pull my hair out, not these! At first I wasn’t sure how much use I’d get out of the pink and champagne colors but I probably use those the most they’re so fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice material, way overpriced for what it is though, stretched out after a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: • perfect use, wearing one now!

reviews.review_title: Pricey but worth it for my fine thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these! They hold my fine thin hair well and i can easily remove them smoothly. I may lose 1-3 hairs compared to the ”ouchless” black plastic/rubber kind that is difficult to remove, breaks and pulls way too much of my hair. One star off for the price; but worth not having the pain on my scalp and hello I need all the hair on my head. Bought it during the sale period.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been eyeing these for a while but it's pricy so I was hesitant in purchasing. I've searched everywhere for a hair tie that doesn't leave a crease in my hair or pull my hair out and I'VE FINALLY FOUND IT. These are actually amazing, I never knew I could love a scrunchie so much. It's a splurge but it was worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I was hesitant to get this. It just seems like a ridiculous price for 6 hair ties, especially for someone like me that buys her hair ties in bulk. But I'm so glad I caved and got them during the holiday sale. Now I kinda regrate that I did not get more! Such a noticeable difference! No more pulling and breakage. So gentle on my long fine hair. Would recommend for anyone that wants to grow their hair longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin/fine hair and these smaller scrunchies are the perfect size. My hair is damaged from bleaching so I’m trying take better care of my hair now, and when I take out my ponytail it just glides right out, no pulling or breakage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! There are my new everyday hair ties. I can't leave my house without one on my wrist. They're really cute and I think they're worth it. They haven't creased my hair yet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The classiest, cutest scrunchies around.  Look great in my hair, look great on my wrist, are gentle and leave no kinks.  Would love some in silver too.

reviews.review_title: super cute and great for hair protection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! I always used the goody ouchless hair ties and they not only left marks but my hair was constantly pulled out. These don’t pull out my hair and they actually look adorable as a pony tail! I love them! Definitely will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These worked great for me! i have fairly thin hair and they hold it with no problem, the soft material makes sure there is no pulling. they are a little on the pricey side, but worth it to me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are great!! I have used regular hair ties for years. But I have never felt like they lasted or held my hair. These are PERFECT and they are so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are soft and will not damage my hair. However they do not eliminate kinks when sleeping which is main reason I splurged on them. I dry my hair completely and put it up at night and wake up with the same kink that any regular hair tie makes. I have fine, straight hair. Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! I like sleeping with my hair up in the summer but when I wake up it’s always fallen down. I’ve tried invisibobble and teleties (teleties are my personal fav) but they aren’t great for sleeping in. These are my go to now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have fine hair and they hold beautifully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just ordered these and they’re absolutely amazing I don’t get that awful mark that I do sometimes using other bands on my hair (  that awful intention mark where you can tell your hair was up )  ,  I also have  thin bleached hair  and please don’t talk at it as the other reviewer mentioned !!!  I love these and definitely recommend !!! <3

reviews.review_title: Pricey, but they work for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thin, fine shoulder-length hair that's prone to fall-out. These are comfortable and don't tug at the scalp. I love them!
